title: sale component
clause_text: sale component. No premium shall be charged on the fungible compensatory area in respect of area to be handed over to MHADA/MCGM and surplus area to be handed over to MHADA/MCGM shall be exclusive of the Fungible compensatory BUA if availed.
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order
